title: 无线通信系统中的装置和方法
abstract: Disclosed is a device and a method in a wireless communication system, and the device comprises: a transmitting unit configured to transmit a first allocation signal synthesized by use of the superimposed coding to plenty of user equipment at least comprising a first and a second user equipment, and the first allocation signal at least comprising a first power signal part for the first user equipment and a second power signal part for the second user equipment; a receiving unit configured to receive at least a feedback retransmission request from the first and the second user equipment; and a processing unit configured to process the first and the second power signal parts with a preset processing coefficient to obtain a second allocation signal in response to the retransmission request, and the transmitting unit is further configured to transmit the second allocation signal to the first and the second user equipment which merge the first and the second allocation signals in order to separately obtain the data for the first and the second user equipment.

title: Optical glass and optical element
abstract: The optical glass has, in mass %, SiO 2  content of 3.00% or more and 20.00% or less, B 2 O 3  content of 1.00% or more and 18.00% or less, La 2 O 3  content of 20.00% or more and 60.00% or less, Nb 2 O 5  content of 8.80% or more, TiO 2  content of 5.00% or more and 20.00% or less, total content (MgO+CaO+SrO+BaO+ZnO) of 2.00% or more, mass ratio ((MgO+CaO+SrO+BaO+ZnO)/(SiO 2 +B 2 O 3 )) of 0.300 or more, mass ratio ((Nb 2 O 5 +TiO 2 +ZrO 2 +WO 3 )/(SiO 2 +B 2 O 3 )) of 1.600 or more, mass ratio ((La 2 O 3 +Gd 2 O 3 +Y 2 O 3 )/(SiO 2 +B 2 O 3 )) of 2.750 or more, mass ratio ((MgO+CaO+SrO+BaO+ZnO)/(Nb 2 O 5 +TiO 2 +ZrO 2 +WO 3 )) of 0.290 or less, and mass ratio ((Nb 2 O 5 +TiO 2 )/(SiO 2 +B 2 O 3 )) of 1.400 or more.

title: Vertical integrated washer dryer
abstract: A vertical integrated washer dryer. The vertical integrated washer dryer can implement reduction of wrinkles of laundry during drying operation. The vertical integrated washer dryer comprises: a motor, generating a driving force; a washing tub, accommodating laundry and accepting the driving force of the motor to rotate; a rotating wing, accepting the driving force of the motor to rotate in the washing tub; a brake, enabling the rotation of the washing tub to stop; a clutch, disconnecting or connecting a transfer path of the driving force from the motor to the washing tub; an air supply part, supplying air to the washing tub; and a control part. The control part controls the motor, the brake, the clutch, and the air supply part, and performs drying operation for drying the laundry in the washing tub. During drying operation, the control part enables the motor to work so that the rotating wing can rotate, the brake is released and the transfer path is disconnected, so that the washing tub is in a free state.

title: Random access method, apparatus, and communication system
abstract: La présente invention concerne un procédé d'accès aléatoire, un appareil et un système de communication, ledit procédé comprenant les étapes suivantes : un dispositif de réseau reçoit, sur une première ressource temps-fréquence, un premier préambule envoyé par un premier équipement utilisateur ; le dispositif de réseau détermine, selon le premier préambule, une première bande passante de porteuse (BWP DL) pour envoyer un second message (msg.2A) ; et le dispositif de réseau envoie le msg.2A sur le premier BWP DL. En utilisant ledit procédé, une station de base peut déterminer, en fonction de la ressource temps-fréquence utilisée par une demande d'accès aléatoire reçue envoyée par l'équipement utilisateur, et/ou le préambule, et/ou les informations d'indication contenues dans la requête d'accès aléatoire, la BWP DL pour renvoyer une RAR, assurant l'accès normal de l'équipement utilisateur.

title: 드럼식 세탁기
abstract: 본 발명은 전기 소모량의 증가를 억제하는 동시에 세척성능을 향상할 수 있는 드럼식 세탁기를 제공한다. 드럼식 세탁기(1)는 드럼(22)과 회전체(24)를 동일한 회전속도로 일체로 회전시키는 구동형태인 1축 구동형태, 및 드럼(22)과 회전체(24)를 상이한 회전속도로 회전시키는 구동형태인 2축 구동형태로 작동할 수 있는 구동부(30); 외조(20) 내에 저장된 세탁에 사용되는 물을 가열하는 가열기(60); 및 적어도 제 1 세탁 코스와 제 2 세탁 코스의 세탁 작동을 실시하는 제어부를 구비한다. 제어부는 제 1 세탁 코스의 세탁 과정에서 1축 구동형태로 구동부(30)를 작동시키고 가열기(60)를 작동시킨다. 또한, 제어부는 제 2 세탁 코스의 세탁 과정에서 2축 구동형태로 구동부(30)를 작동시키고 제 1 세탁 코스에 비해 물에 가하는 열량이 작아지도록 가열기(60)를 작동시킨다.

title: Dispositif terminal, dispositif de station de base, et procédé
abstract: A terminal apparatus for communicating with a base station apparatus, the terminal apparatus includes: a receiver configured to receive an RRC message from the base station apparatus; and a processing unit, in which the RRC message is a message for indicating mobility from a first RAT to a second RAT, the first RAT being NR, and the processing unit performs, based on a fact that information configured to indicate that the second RAT is UTRA is included in the RRC message, processing to forward, to upper layers, information used for key synchronisation and key freshness included in the RRC message.

title: Appareil électronique
abstract: An electronic apparatus comprises a main body (1) and a base by which the main body (1) is placed on a table top. The base comprises a base body (2) and a boss (3). The boss (3) is fixedly connected to the base body (2). A first connector is disposed on the boss (3), a second connector fitting to the first connector is disposed on the bottom of the main body (1), and the first connector and the second connector are plugged to connect the main body (1) and the base. The electronic apparatus can be fixed without using a screw, which makes the mounting simple; the base and the boss are short, which helps to reduce the accommodating space of the base during packaging; and the structure is simple, which reduces the number of components of the base.

title: Dispositif station de base, dispositif terminal et procédé de communication
abstract: 端末装置と基地局装置が効率的に通信を行う。端末装置が、DCIを受信する受信部と、前記DCIでスケジュールされるトランスポートブロックのトランスポートブロックサイズを決定する決定部と、を備え、前記決定部は、第１のシンボルの数に基づきリソースエレメントを算出し、算出されたリソースエレメントに少なくとも基づき第１のＰＵＳＣＨのためのトランスポートブロックサイズを決定し、前記第１のシンボルの数は、前記ＤＣＩに含まれる第１のフィールドに与えられ、前記第１のＰＵＳＣＨ送信に用いられるシンボル数は、第１のシンボルの数および利用可能なシンボルの数に基づいて与えられ、前記第１のＰＵＳＣＨ送信は、前記トランスポートブロックの１回目繰り返し送信に対応する。

title: Dispositif d'affichage d'images
abstract: 放音孔が視聴者側から殆ど見えず、然も良好な音質を得ることが出来る画像表示装置を提供する。　本発明に係る画像表示装置においては、フロントキャビネット３とバックキャビネット４を互いに接合してなる筐体の内部に、ディスプレイ５とスピーカユニット６が配備されており、フロントキャビネット３の底壁部３２は、バックキャビネット側に低く傾斜し、該底壁部３２に放音孔１２が開設されている。スピーカユニット６は、その放音方向を斜め下方に向けた姿勢でバックキャビネット４に取り付けられている。スピーカユニット６には導音ブラケット７が取り付けられ、該導音ブラケット７は、ディスプレイ５とフロントキャビネット３の底壁部３２との間に形成される空間を放音孔１２へ向けて伸び、放音孔１２と対向する位置で開口している。

title: 由用户设备执行的方法以及用户设备
abstract: According to the present invention, provided is a method performed by a user equipment (UE), the method comprising: when a sending packet data convergence protocol (PDCP) entity delivers a PDCP protocol data unit, i.e. a PDCP PDU, to a radio link control (RLC) layer, determining whether a master RLC entity in the master RLC entity and a secondary RLC entity, that are associated with the sending PDCP entity, is suspended or paused; if it is determined that the transmission of the master RLC entity is not suspended or paused, the sending PDCP entity delivering the PDCP PDU to the master RLC entity; and if it is determined that the transmission of the master RLC entity is suspended or paused, the sending PDCP entity delivering the PDCP PDU to the secondary RLC entity. FIG. 2

title: Thin-film magnetic head and method of manufacturing same
abstract: A top pole layer has a first portion and a second portion. The first portion has an end located in an air bearing surface, has a constant width equal to a write track width, and includes a pole portion. The second portion is coupled to the other end of the first portion and includes a yoke portion. The first portion, a write gap layer, and a part of the bottom pole layer closer to the write gap layer have an equal width in a region where the first portion of the top pole layer and the bottom pole layer are opposed to each other via the write gap layer. The thickness of the first portion of the top pole layer in a region extending from the air bearing surface to a predetermined position is smaller than the thickness of the other part of the top pole layer adjacent to this region.

title: Method executed by user equipment, and user equipment
abstract: Provided in the present invention is a method executed by a user equipment (UE). The method comprises: receiving first indication information and second indication information, wherein the first indication information represents the synchronization signal block (SSB) sequence number of an SSB, which is actually sent in a network, and the second indication information represents a sequence and indication bits for a plurality of channel state information reference signal (CSI-RS) configuration groups; and according to the first indication information and the second indication information, determining a correspondence between a CSI-RS signal corresponding to each of the plurality of CSI-RS configuration groups and the SSB sequence number of the SSB, which is actually sent in the network.

title: Procédés de communication, dispositifs terminaux, et supports lisibles par ordinateur
abstract: Des modes de réalisation de la présente divulgation concernent une solution destinée à la transmission de liaison latérale. Dans un procédé de communication, un premier dispositif terminal détermine une fenêtre de sélection de ressource pour une transmission de liaison latérale du premier dispositif terminal à un second dispositif terminal. Ensuite, le premier dispositif terminal détermine une durée à l'intérieur de la fenêtre de sélection de ressource. En outre, le premier dispositif terminal détermine au moins une ressource pour la transmission de liaison latérale à l'intérieur de la fenêtre de sélection de ressource sans la durée. De cette manière, la fenêtre de sélection de ressource du premier dispositif terminal pour la transmission de liaison latérale est optimisée, ce qui permet d'améliorer les performances de la transmission de liaison latérale.

title: Procédé de compensation des charges, procédé de mesure pour l'évaluation des charges, station de base, et équipement d'utilisateur
abstract: La présente invention concerne un procédé de compensation des charges, une station de base, et un équipement d'utilisateur. Selon le procédé de compensation des charges de l'invention, une station de base d'une cellule de compensation commence par acquérir une valeur d'évaluation des ressources dont a besoin un équipement d'utilisateur d'une cellule à économie d'énergie de la cellule de compensation, en tenant compte de la qualité du signal de la cellule de compensation mesurée par l'équipement d'utilisateur de la cellule à économie d'énergie (101). Ladite station de base détermine alors s'il y a lieu de compenser la cellule d'économie d'énergie conformément à la valeur d'évaluation des ressources dont a besoin l'équipement d'utilisateur de la cellule à économie d'énergie dans la cellule de compensation (102). Enfin, lorsqu'elle a déterminé qu'il y a lieu de compenser la cellule à économie d'énergie, ladite station de base renforce la puissance des ressources corrélatives de façon à compenser la cellule à économie d'énergie (103). Avec l'invention, la cellule à économie d'énergie qui occupera les ressources de la cellule à économie d'énergie aura connaissance de l'équipement d'utilisateur, ce qui permettra une plus grande précision dans la compensation des charges.

title: Method of manufacturing laser diode unit utilizing submount bar
abstract: A manufacturing method of laser diode unit of the present invention includes steps: placing a laser diode on top of a solder member formed on a mounting surface of a submount, applying a pressing load to the laser diode and pressing the laser diode against the solder member, next, melting the solder member by heating the solder member at a temperature higher than a melting point of the solder member while the pressing load is being applied, and thereafter, bonding the laser diode to the submount by cooling and solidifying the solder member, thereafter, removing the pressing load, and softening the solidified solder member by heating the solder member at a temperature lower than the melting point of the solder member after the pressing load has been removed, and thereafter cooling and re-solidifying the solder member.

title: Display panel and display device with narrow bezel
abstract: Provided is a display panel. The display panel includes touch lines each extending in a first direction; data signal lines each extending in the first direction; touch connection lines, display connection lines; and a driver chip having touch signal terminals and display signal terminals. The touch signal terminals and the plurality of display signal terminals are arranged in one or more rows with one of the one or more rows having n touch signal terminals and m display signal terminals, the one or more rows extend in a second direction. Two adjacent ones of the n touch signal terminals in the one row are spaced apart by one or more of the m display signal terminals, and where n and m are positive integers.

title: Methods and apparatuses for transmitting and receiving reference signals
abstract: La présente invention consiste en des modes de réalisation qui concernent des procédés et des appareils pour émettre et recevoir des signaux de référence. Lors de l'émission de signaux de référence, des signaux de référence sont émis à l'aide d'un premier groupe de ressources de configuration dans un premier groupe de ressources de transmission ; et les signaux de référence sont transmis à l'aide d'un second groupe de ressources de configuration dans un second groupe de ressources de transmission. Le premier groupe de ressources de configuration est déterminé sur la base de configurations de ressources attribuées pour les signaux de référence et le second groupe de ressources de configuration est un sous-ensemble du premier groupe de ressources de configuration.

title: Remote control, imaging device, method and system for the same
abstract: L'invention concerne une télécommande, un dispositif d'imagerie, un procédé et un système associés prévus pour mettre en oeuvre les fonctions telles que la sélection de canaux de programmes, l'entrée de caractères, etc. La télécommande comprend: un moyen d'actionnement présentant de multiples touches, un moyen de transmission de signaux ultrasonores et radio destiné à la transmission de signaux radio et de signaux ultrasonores tandis qu'une desdites multiples touches est actionnée pour faire correspondre la position de la télécommande dans un dispositif d'affichage de curseur sur un écran, et un moyen de commande permettant de commander ledit moyen d'actionnement et ledit moyen de transmission de signaux ultrasonore et radio.

title: 기능수 제조장치 및 기능수 제조방법
abstract: An apparatus for producing functional water comprises: a compression adjusting valve adjusting the pressure of ultra-pure water to be uniform; a feeding pump pressurizing the ultra-pure water of which the pressure is adjusted by the compression adjusting valve and adjusting the pressurizing amount; a dissolving device applying specific functions to the ultra-pure water pressurized by the feeding pump and dissolving functional gas; and a control device controlling the discharge pressure of the feeding pump to be uniform based on the water pressure or a flow rate of functional water in which the functional gas is dissolved.

title: 数据传输、数据指示装置以及方法
abstract: Embodiments of the present application provide a data transmission device and method, and a data indication device and method. By mapping one or more sub-QoS flows to a data radio bearer (DRB), the mapping of the one or more sub-QoS flows is established; and data transmission is performed on the one or more sub-QoS flows according to the mapping. Thus, sub-QoS flows can be mapped to corresponding DRBs, such that QoS differentiation for PDU sets having different importance in the QoS flows is supported, the efficiency during scheduling and packet loss processing is further improved, and the waste of resources is reduced.

title: Sidelink transmission and reception
abstract: Embodiments of the present disclosure relate to methods, devices and computer readable media for sidelink transmission and reception. A method of communication comprises receiving, at a receiving device, information from a transmitting device in a first slot starting from a first time. The method further comprises, in response to additional reception of the information being enabled, receiving the information from the transmitting device in a second slot starting from a second time, the second time being later than the first time by a time interval. Embodiments of the present disclosure can fulfill the coverage requirement for V2X communications in NR.

title: 信息反馈方法、码本确定方法、用户设备和基站
abstract: La présente invention concerne un procédé de contrôle par retour d'information, un procédé de détermination de livre de codes, un équipement utilisateur et une station de base correspondante. Le procédé de contrôle par retour d'information comprend les étapes suivantes: la fourniture par l'équipement utilisateur d'information associée en retour vers la station de base lorsque le support de la transmission d'un ou de plusieurs flux de données est assuré à la fois dans la direction horizontale et la direction verticale d'un réseau d'antennes; l'information associée comporte un quelconque ou plusieurs parmi la quantité de flux de données dont le support est assuré dans la direction verticale, la quantité de flux de données totaux dont le support est assuré par l'équipement utilisateur; et lorsque la quantité de flux de données dont le support est assuré dans la direction horizontale ou la quantité de flux de données dont le support est assuré dans la direction verticale est une valeur prédéterminée, l'information associée comporte un quelconque parmi la quantité de flux de données dont le support est assuré dans la direction verticale et la quantité de flux de données totaux dont le support est assuré par l'équipement utilisateur, ou l'information associée comporte un quelconque parmi la quantité de flux de données dont le support est assuré dans la direction horizontale et la quantité de flux de données totaux dont le support est assuré par l'équipement utilisateur. Selon le procédé le surdébit dans une rétroaction unique peut être réduit et la taille de matrice de précodage peut être réduite.

title: Method, device and computer readable medium for multi-trp transmission
abstract: Embodiments of the present disclosure relate to methods, devices and computer readable media for multi-Transmission and Reception Point (TRP) transmission. In example embodiments, a method implemented in a terminal device includes determining a first link direction for a symbol, based on a first indication received via a first TRP coupled with a network device, the first link direction indicating a direction of a first transmission to be performed in the symbol between the terminal device and the network device via the first TRP. The method further includes determining a second link direction for the symbol, based on a second indication received via a second TRP coupled with the network device, the second link direction indicating a direction of a second transmission to be performed in the symbol between the terminal device and the network device via the second TRP. The method further includes determining, based on the first and second link directions, a target transmission to be performed in the symbol from the first and second transmissions.

title: Système de communication par radio cognitive, et dispositif et procédé associés correspondants
abstract: 本公开提供了认知无线电通信系统及用于其中的设备和方法。一种用于认知无线电通信系统中的设备可包括：接收装置，用于接收另一无线电通信系统中各设备之间的通信信号；特征提取装置，用于从所述通信信号中提取能够反映所述另一无线电通信系统的上下行传输方式之间的差异的一个或更多个特征；以及上下行判断装置，用于根据所述特征来判断所述通信信号占用的信道资源用于上行传输还是下行传输。

title: 由用户设备执行的方法以及用户设备
abstract: Provided are a method executed by a user equipment (UE) and a UE. The method comprises: receiving configuration information sent by a base station gNB; determining the number of REs NRE' allocated for PDSCH transmission in one PRB within a CSI reference resource; according to said NRE', determining the number of transport block bits TBS within the CSI reference resource; and derive a CQI index according to the TBS within the CSI reference resource.

title: Card connector with improved ejector cam portion
abstract: A card connector ( 100 ) includes an insulative housing ( 10 ), a number of contacts ( 30 ) retained in the insulative housing, a metal shell ( 20 ) covering the insulative housing for defining a receiving space ( 60 ), and an ejector ( 50 ) assembled on the insulative housing. The ejector includes a cam portion ( 51 ) and a shaft ( 52 ) actuating the cam portion. The cam portion includes a pivoting portion ( 510 ), a first arm portion ( 511 ) and a second arm portion ( 512 ) respectively and angularly extending from the pivoting portion, and at least one positioning portion ( 513 ) extending from the pivoting portion along a vertical direction. At least one of the metal shell and the insulative housing defines a hole ( 19, 25 ) receiving the at least one positioning portion.

title: Rotary drum washing machine
abstract: L'invention concerne une machine à laver à tambour rotatif capable de réaliser une amélioration des performances de nettoyage tout en étant capable d'empêcher une augmentation de la taille d'une pièce d'entraînement. Une unité d'entraînement (30) comprend : un moteur d'entraînement (100) ; un arbre de flanc (200), dont une extrémité est reliée à un agitateur (24) et l'autre extrémité est reliée à un rotor (110) du moteur d'entraînement (100), et qui accompagne la rotation du rotor (110) ; un mécanisme d'engrenage planétaire (400) qui réduit la vitesse de rotation du rotor (110) ; un arbre de tambour rotatif (300) relié à un tambour rotatif (22) et entourant l'arbre de flanc (200) et le mécanisme d'engrenage planétaire (400), réduisant la vitesse et transférant la rotation de l'arbre de flanc (200) par l'intermédiaire du mécanisme d'engrenage planétaire (400) ; et une unité formant palier (500) comprenant un premier roulement à rouleaux (513) et un deuxième roulement à rouleaux (523) configurés pour prendre en sandwich le mécanisme d'engrenage planétaire (400) et supportant l'arbre de tambour rotatif (300) en rotation libre par l'intermédiaire desdits premier (513) et deuxième (523) roulements à rouleaux.

title: 处理mcch的配置信息的方法以及用户设备
abstract: 本发明提供一种由用户设备执行的处理MCCH的配置信息的方法。本发明的一个方面的处理MCCH的配置信息的方法包括：当处于RRC非激活态的用户设备接收到来自基站的关于MBS多播的系统信息更新指示时，确定在所述用户设备处是否存储有由专用RRC信令配置的针对MBS多播的MCCH的配置信息；以及若在所述用户设备处存储有由专用RRC信令配置的针对MBS多播的MCCH的配置信息，则删除所存储的所述MCCH的配置信息。

title: System and method for image thumbnail/preview on an image processing device
abstract: An image processing device and method for modifying images on an image processing device including a scanner configured to produce an image of at least one document having multiple pages, a communications interface configured to connect the image processing device to a server via a network, a display unit configured to display a preview image or a thumbnail image of at least one of the pages of the scanned document and a user interface configured to display a selectable graphical indicia corresponding to at least one operation for modifying the preview image or the at least one image of the scanned document.

title: Procede d'amelioration de l'efficacite de transformation d'une plante et procede de transformation de plante
abstract: La présente invention concerne un procédé d'amélioration de l'efficacité de transformation d'une plante. Le procédé selon la présente invention comprend l'utilisation d'un acide nucléique codant pour la séquence d'acides aminés présentée dans SEQ ID NO : 2 ou 4, ou un acide nucléique codant pour un polypeptide comprenant une séquence d'acides aminés ayant au moins 85 % d'identité avec la séquence d'acides aminés présentée dans SEQ ID NO : 2 ou 4, et ayant une fonction d'amélioration de l'efficacité de transformation d'une plante.

title: Procédé, dispositif et support de communication
abstract: Example embodiments of the present disclosure relate to a solution for resource allocation configuration for a sidelink reference signal. In this solution, a first communication device obtains a resource allocation configuration for a sidelink reference signal, the resource allocation configuration comprising: a first resource allocation configuration indicating a resource pool set and a time-frequency location in the resource pool set, the resource pool set comprising a plurality of resource pools for sidelink communication, or a second resource allocation configuration indicating a number of resource units selected from a dedicated resource pool for communication of the sidelink reference signal, a resource unit being of a predetermined bandwidth. The first communication device determines a resource allocated for the sidelink reference signal based on the resource allocation configuration, and performs communication of the sidelink reference signal with at least one second communication device using the determined resource.

title: Method and device for resetting media access control layer
abstract: Provided is a method for resetting a media access control (MAC) layer at a user equipment (UE). The method comprises: sending a system information request message for requesting system information to a network side by means of a random access process; and when the system information is unsuccessfully requested, resetting a MAC layer. Also provided is a corresponding device.

title: Washing and drying-intergrated machine
abstract: 一种抑制从外筒（3）流入排气管道（60）的空气中所含的尘埃等蓄积于排气管道（60）的内周面的洗干一体机（101），具备：外筒（3）；大致圆筒形状的滚筒（5），旋转自如地配置于外筒（3）内；以及排气管道（60），经由形成于外筒（3）的上部周面壁的流入口（61）与外筒（3）内连通，流入口（61）在主视时配置于相对于滚筒（5）的旋转轴（30）在左右方向上偏心的位置，排气管道（60）是从正面侧向背面侧延伸且以其背面侧与流入口（61）对置的方式配置的中空的箱状构件，排气管道（60）的后部的内周面形成为曲面形状或斜面形状。

title: Ue 및 ue의 통신 제어 방법
abstract: 네트워크(NW)가 복수의 혼잡 제어들을 적용하는 경우에, 백-오프 타이머(세션 관리(SM) 타이머)와 함께 다양한 종류들의 혼잡 제어 식별 정보가 통지되어, 단말기 장치(UE)가 NW에 의해 예상되는 혼잡 제어를 적용할 수 있도록 한다.  대안으로, UE가 백-오프 타이머가 활성화된 채로 NW 개시 SM 요청을 수신한 경우에, UE는 NW 개시 SM 요청에 의해 의도된 SM 타이머를 식별하도록 허용된다.  대안으로, UE가 백-오프 타이머가 활성화된 채로 NW 개시 SM 요청을 수신한 경우에, UE는 활성화된 백-오프 타이머 및 적용될 혼잡 제어의 연관성을 변경하도록 허용된다.  따라서, 단말기가, 복수의 혼잡 제어들을 적용하는 5G 혼잡 제어에서 NW에 의해 적용되는 혼잡 제어들 중 NW에 의해 예상되는 혼잡 제어를 적용하기 위한 통신 제어 방법이 제공된다.

title: Method, device and computer storage medium for communication
abstract: Les modes de réalisation de la présente divulgation concernent des procédés, des dispositifs et des supports de stockage informatiques de communication. Un procédé comprend les étapes consistant à : transmettre d'un dispositif de réseau à un dispositif terminal une pluralité de répétitions de PDCCH permettant de planifier des transmissions en liaison descendante, au moins une partie de la pluralité de répétitions de PDCCH indiquant une même valeur d'indicateur d'attribution de liaison descendante (DAI) d'un compteur ; sur la base de la pluralité de répétitions de PDCCH, effectuer les transmissions en liaison descendante du dispositif de réseau au dispositif terminal ; et recevoir une séquence de renvoi relative aux transmissions en liaison descendante provenant du dispositif terminal, ladite au moins une partie de la pluralité de répétitions de PDCCH correspondant à un même champ de renvoi dans la séquence de renvoi. Les modes de réalisation de la présente divulgation proposent une manière d'indiquer des valeurs de DAI pour des répétitions de PDCCH. Le livre de codes HARQ-ACK dynamique peut être obtenu sur la base des valeurs de DAI sans surdébit de signalisation supplémentaire.

title: Resource indication method and apparatus as well as communication system
abstract: 一种资源指示方法及其装置、通信系统。其中，该资源指示方法包括：终端设备接收网络设备发送的用于动态指示资源池中的时域资源的第三指示信息，和/或终端设备接收网络设备发送的用于指示资源池中的第一时域资源的第一指示信息；通过指示信息指示半静态配置和/或动态配置的时域资源中有哪些时域资源可以被包含在资源池中，V2X终端设备可以使用该资源池中的资源进行数据收发，由此，可以支持未来通信系统中的V2X通信。

title: Procédé d'exploitation sur un ue et ue
abstract: 本发明实施例提供了一种在用户设备UE上运行的方法，所述方法包括：启动随机接入过程中的前导码发送计数器COUNTER以统计在随机接入过程中前导码的发送次数；以及当所述计数器COUNTER的值达到或超过预设的最大发送次数时，根据随机接入过程的触发原因确定是否向UE的上层指示随机接入问题。

title: Fibra para um pano não-tecido entrelaçado por umidade
abstract: There is provided a fiber for a wetlaid non-woven fabric, said fiber can be the basis ingredient of a paper that maintains uniform mass per unit area and fiber dispersion and has unprecedented bulkiness. The fiber for a wetlaid non-woven fabric has 30 to 100 wt % of apparently crimping fibers with a fiber diameter of from 3 to 40 μm and 0 to 70 wt % of latently crimping fibers with a fiber diameter of from 3 to 40 μm.

title: Transmissão e recepção de sinais de sincronização para sistema de rádio
abstract: a presente revelação apresenta um nó de acesso que compreende um circuito processador de nó e um transmissor de nó. o circuito processador de nó é configurado para gerar múltiplos tipos de blocos de sinal de sincronização para transmissão ao menos parcialmente intercalada através de uma interface de rádio. cada tipo de bloco de sinal de sincronização compreende uma combinação exclusiva de tipos diferentes de informações. o circuito transmissor de nó é configurado para ao menos parcialmente intercalar a transmissão dos múltiplos tipos de blocos de sinal de sincronização através da interface de rádio para ao menos um terminal sem fio. o terminal sem fio compreende um receptor de terminal e um circuito processador de terminal. o receptor de terminal é configurado para receber de um nó de acesso, em uma forma ao menos parcialmente intercalada, blocos de sinal de sincronização de tipos diferentes através de uma interface de rádio. o circuito processador de terminal é configurado para determinar a qual dentre os múltiplos tipos de blocos de sinal de sincronização um bloco de sinal de sincronização recebido pertence.

title: Wireless communication method and wireless communication device
abstract: A wireless communication method and a wireless communication device. The wireless communication device includes: one or more processors, configured to generate multiple data flows, the multiple data flows being transmitted to one or more receivers through the first quantity of radio frequency links; and to configure an antenna control parameter, the antenna control parameter being used for dynamically allocating the second quantity of antennas to the first quantity of radio frequency links. The one or more processors configure the antenna control parameter for transmission to be performed, and any one of the second quantity of antennas can be allocated to any one of the first quantity of radio frequency links in a configurable manner.

title: Dispositifs et procédés de communication
abstract: Embodiments of the present disclosure provide a solution for transmission configuration indicator (TCI) selection. In the solution, a terminal device receives, a first message comprising a first configuration indicating a selection of TCI state; and determines, a set of TCI states intended for the selection of TCI state based on one or more relationship between a TCI selection field and a TCI field. In this way, the terminal device may interpret the TCI-related configuration and select TCI state(s) properly.

verification.reproduction_query: SELECT DISTINCT             p.publication_number,             p.family_id,             ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT t.text IGNORE NULLS) as title,             ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT a.text IGNORE NULLS) as abstract,             p.filing_date,             p.publication_date,             p.inventor_harmonized,             p.assignee_harmonized,             p.cpc         FROM             `patents-public-data.patents.publications` p,             UNNEST(p.title_localized) as t,             UNNEST(p.abstract_localized) as a,             UNNEST(p.assignee_harmonized) as assignee_cn,             UNNEST(p.assignee_harmonized) as assignee_target         WHERE             p.publication_date >= 20000101             AND assignee_cn.country_code = 'CN'             AND assignee_target.country_code = 'JP'             AND assignee_cn != assignee_target         GROUP BY             p.publication_number,             p.family_id,             p.filing_date,             p.publication_date,             p.inventor_harmonized,             p.assignee_harmonized,             p.cpc         LIMIT 50

title: Expression of genes from gram negative bacteria in fungi
abstract: La présente invention concerne une méthode permettant l'expression recombinante de polypeptides provenant de bactéries à gram négatif, chez un hôte fongique approprié à la production industrielle. Dans un premier aspect, la présente invention concerne une méthode permettant l'expression recombinante d'un polypeptide d'une bactérie à gram négatif dans une cellule hôte fongique, comprenant les étapes consistant à : i) obtenir une séquence d'acide nucléique codant pour le polypeptide, ladite sequence d'acide nucléique comprenant une première séquence d'acide nucléique codant pour un peptide signal fongique et une deuxième séquence d'acide nucléique codant pour le polypeptide, ayant au moins un codon modifié, la modification n'induisant pas de changement de l'acide aminé codé par ledit codon et la séquence d'acide nucléique dudit codon étant différente par rapport au codon correspondant dans la séquence d'acide nucléique de type sauvage présente chez ladite bactérie à gram négatif ; ii) exprimer la séquence d'acide nucléique modifiée chez l'hôte fongique.

title: Projector apparatus
abstract: This invention provide a projector apparatus enabled to lower its exhaust air temperature by adding only minor modifications to the existing structure, without altering its basic structure. The liquid crystal projector apparatus of the invention has a casing ( 1 ) for accommodating therein a light source ( 4 ), an optical system adapted to construct imaging light in response to a beam of light received from the light source, a power supply ( 9 ), and a cooling unit ( 6 ) mounted on the side wall of the casing ( 1 ) to cool the components in the casing. Provided on the inner wall of the casing is an air inspiration mechanism ( 16, 17, 18, 126 ) in association with the exhaust unit ( 6 ), whereby the exhaust unit ( 6 ) can inspire ambient air through the air inspiration mechanism to lower the temperature of the air to be expired from the exhaust unit.

title: 波束指示方法、装置和系统
abstract: 一种波束指示方法、装置和系统，其中，所述方法包括：终端设备接收激活信令，所述激活信令激活至少一个传输(transmission)；所述终端设备根据以下理解对所述至少一个传输进行发送或接收：在接收到去激活信令或者下一次激活信令之前，所述激活信令所激活的所有传输，使用相同的空域滤波器或者传输假设，或者使用通过动态解读所述激活信令而确定的各自的空域滤波器或者传输假设。由此，对于半持续调度或者周期性调度的传输，在激活信令和去激活信令或下一次激活信令之间，使用相同的空域滤波器或者传输假设，或者使用通过动态解读所述激活信令而确定的各自的空域滤波器或者传输假设，进行发送或接收，解决了在上述区间的波束指示模糊的问题。

title: Method, system, program, and readable storage medium for providing service quality guarantee to network service
abstract: A method for guaranteeing a service quality of a network service is disclosed that includes the steps of storing a historical record of a network service quality, inputting an acceptable maximal service delay of the network service, inputting a desired control level between the service quality of the network service and the number of users of the network service, determining the content of service quality guarantee, which can be provided to each service node, with respect to each pair of service nodes in accordance with the historical record, the maximal service delay, and the control level between the service quality and the number of users, monitoring the service quality between a corresponding pair of service nodes in accordance with the content of service quality guarantee, and regulating the network service between a pair of service nodes in a case where degradation of service quality occurs between the pair of service nodes.

title: Electroacoustic transducing device
abstract: An electroacoustic transducing device comprising: a magnetic circuit having a yoke, a magnet, and a pole piece; a vibration system having a diaphragm and a voice coil; and a frame which holds the magnetic circuit and the vibration system. The voice coil is placed in a magnetic gap, and has lead wires of the voice coil which are drawn out from the voice coil at positions which are remote from the diaphragm. Openings for air forming for forming slack portions in the lead wires are drawn out from the voice coil and are disposed in the frame. The lead wires are adequately subjected to the wire laying process, and the audio performance is prevented from being lowered.

title: Time index indication method, timing acquisition method and device therefor, and communication system
abstract: La présente invention concerne un procédé d'indication d'un indice temporel d'un bloc de signal de synchronisation, un procédé d'acquisition de temporisation et un dispositif associé, et un système de communication. Le procédé d'indication d'un indice temporel d'un bloc de signal de synchronisation consiste : à utiliser un nouveau signal de référence de démodulation de canal de diffusion physique radio (NR-PBCH DMRS) dans une largeur de bande de signal de synchronisation afin d'indiquer un indice temporel d'un bloc de signal de synchronisation (bloc SS), le bloc de signal de synchronisation comprenant un signal de synchronisation primaire et un signal de synchronisation secondaire et un canal de diffusion physique. Au moyen du procédé pour indiquer un indice temporel d'un bloc de signal de synchronisation dans le mode de réalisation, un dispositif terminal peut obtenir des informations de temporisation requises.

title: Photocurable resin composition and cured product thereof
abstract: To provide a colored photocurable resin composition capable of forming a solder resist layer excellent in property of hiding defective appearance of a copper circuit attributed to tarnish by oxidation. The photocurable resin composition can be developed with a dilute alkali solution and comprises: (A) a carboxylic acid-containing resin; (B) a photopolymerization initiator; c a compound having two or more ethylenically unsaturated groups per molecule; and (D) a red colorant.
